DOC.detailed_description: UP0027 Phase 1 , single-center , open-label study investigate safety , tolerability , PK profile radiprodil healthy adult male female subject single fast oral dose radiprodil 30 mg suspension formulation . A total 10 subject enrol study . The primary objective study evaluate PK profile oral radiprodil suspension form healthy adult subject . The secondary objective study evaluate safety tolerability oral radiprodil suspension form healthy adult subject . The exploratory objective study evaluate comparative PK profile radiprodil sample collect use 2 alternative microsampling technique ( MITRA™ Drummond capillary tube ) conventional venous blood sample , test perception taste texture oral radiprodil suspension .
